description: This file defines Backbone.Marionette views for a TodoMVC application, including item view, list view body, and list view, managing rendering, filtering, and user interactions.

classes.name: TodoMVC.TodoView
classes.description: View for individual todo item, handles display, editing, toggling, and deletion.

classes.name: TodoMVC.ListViewBody
classes.description: Collection view for list of todo items, handles filtering.

classes.name: TodoMVC.ListView
classes.description: Main list view managing the collection, including toggle all and rendering.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Toggles the completed state of the todo item.

methods.name: onEditClick
methods.description: Enables editing mode for the todo item.

methods.name: onEditFocusout
methods.description: Saves or deletes the todo item based on input when editing loses focus.

methods.name: onEditKeypress
methods.description: Handles keypress events for editing, including Enter and Escape keys.

methods.name: setCheckAllState
methods.description: Sets the toggle-all checkbox based on collection completion state.

methods.name: onToggleAllClick
methods.description: Sets all todo items to completed or active based on toggle.

methods.name: onRender
methods.description: Renders the list view and its child view.
